ygData.subject: AC question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, ok i just read this mail.. Telling about a wizzard level 10 with 250 ac.... You sure you are at 250 ? :). Just to know, i am at level 18 nearly full
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
ok i just read this mail.. Telling about a wizzard level 10 with 250 ac....
You sure you are at 250 ? :). Just to know, i am at level 18 nearly full
woven/bear with one onyx earing and i only get 270 with shielding... I know
i am an edurite so my agility really sucks but can some guys here what s
their ac ? To see if agility really help for ac ?


thanks all !

yakyak

level 18 wizzard karana (AND BLACSMITH:) )

> -----Original Message-----
> From: eq_wizards@onelist.com [SMTP:eq_wizards@onelist.com]
> Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 1:40 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Digest Number 81
>
>
> Message: 15
> Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 15:39:51 -0700 (PDT)
> From: Rich Mulawa <richard.mulawa@...>
> Subject: Guile's lament
>
> Micheal,
>
> Thanks for your reply. Sorry to sound like I am yet another whining
> about the Wizard class. I actually love the Wizard class but can't
> help but be envious of the others I have seen at my level runing
> around with items that give them 50 extra mana points and AC's near
> 250 at level 10 and I can't raise enough money to buy basic spells.
>
>
